channel.title: Need some info on Ancient Curses deflect curses
channel.description:
hi guys , i'm working on the Ancient Curses for 317 PI server ( based off of exion v1 ) i will put the 3 deflect curses in the regular prayer book ( along with sprites , effect headicons and everything )
i do however need the effects to be perfect ; that's where i need you guys' help:
how much of the damage you receive gets deflected? and does the it always deflect , or does it deflect 20 or 25% of the hits you get?
hope to get a fast answer , the effect is already there , just need these 2 things to make it work 100% like RS =D alright , the deflected damage seems to be 10% of the original damage. now i just need the probability of deflecting....

item.title: Need some info on Ancient Curses deflect curses
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

EmulousGuru:

Make an ancientCurse array.

so what you are suggesting is that i take the normal prayers array , change everything to the Curses accordingly ( names , levels , etc )
wil the client read these automatically , or do i have to declare it somwhere to read them?
if yes , where would i do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some info on Ancient Curses deflect curses
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:2, topic:365225”]Give me a list of each curse, action ID, and level needed, and I’ll work with it to help you.

Please use this format:

Curse Name: <name> Prayer Level Needed: <level> ActionButton Pressed: <actionButton> [/quote]

i know how to get prayers to work XD
clickingbuttons to activate it , combat assistant to work on the effects.

there are 2 bigger problems : the Turmoil sprite wont load in the new interface , and when i add the 20 new prayers in the array of prayers in player.java , it won’t let me load…
it says the array is out of bounds.
other then that , i can perfectly change the interface from curses to normal…

Read full topic
